A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: \"Everything is meaningless in a cold and uncaring universe!\" - that's the lesson the movie tries to impart on the audience. I don't need to be reminded of life's unrelenting bleakness; I watch Star Wars for hopeful escapism. Events which should have meaning are robbed of them\, events which shouldn't are suddenly impactful. The movie isn't subverting expectations in a clever manner\, it's giving a giant middle finger to the audience gleefully when they least expect it\, rejoicing in its childish contrarianism.
